translation.en: Let me tell you about a young guy.

translation.en: Actually, he's about your age.

translation.en: He lived a long way from here...

translation.en: ...in a town called Cicero, Illinois.
translation.de: in einer Stadt namens Cicero, Illinois.

translation.en: And in Cicero, he was the man.
translation.de: Und er war sehr beliebt in Cicero.

translation.en: I mean, when he strolled down the street...

translation.en: ...all the corner boys would give him the high five.
translation.de: klatschten ihn alle Jungs ab.

translation.en: All the finest babes would smile at him...
translation.de: Die tollsten Mädchen lächelten ihn an...

translation.en: ...and hope that he would smile back.
translation.de: und hofften, dass er zurücklächelt.

translation.en: They called him Slippin' Jimmy...
translation.de: Sie nannten ihn Slippin' Jimmy...

translation.en: ...and everybody wanted to be his friend.
translation.de: und alle wollten mit ihm befreundet sein.

translation.en: What the hell kind of name is that?
translation.de: Was für ein bescheuerter Name ist das denn?

translation.en: Well, I'll tell you now. Winters in Cicero are murder.
translation.de: Ich werde es euch sagen. Die Winter in Cicero sind hart.

translation.en: You guys, growing up out here in the Golden West, you don't know.
translation.de: Ihr seid hier im Goldenen Westen aufgewachsen, ihr habt keine Ahnung.

translation.en: Okay? I'm talking cold that'll freeze the snot right in your nose.
translation.de: Ok? Es ist so kalt, dass deine Nase einfriert.

translation.en: I'm talking wind that'll cut through your jacket and carve you up like a Ginsu knife.

translation.en: In fact, most folks in Cicero were scared of winter.
translation.de: Die meisten Leute in Cicero hatten Angst vor dem Winter.

translation.en: But not Jimmy.
translation.de: Aber nicht Jimmy.

translation.en: Jimmy would wait around all summer...
translation.de: Jimmy wartete den ganzen Sommer lang...

translation.en: ...and when September finally rolled around...
translation.de: und als es September war...

translation.en: ...and he'd feel that first cold wind come sweeping off Lake Michigan...
translation.de: und er den ersten kalten Wind vom Lake Michigan spürte...

translation.en: ...he knew it was coming.
translation.de: wusste er, dass er im Anmarsch ist.

translation.en: Was it Christmas? Was it Kwanzaa?

translation.en: Better. It was slip-and-fall season.

translation.en: As soon as it was cold enough, he'd find a nice, smooth patch of ice.

translation.en: State Street was good, Michigan Avenue was better.
translation.de: State Street war gut, Michigan Avenue war besser.

translation.en: He'd pick his spot, wait for it to get busy...

translation.en: ...then he'd walk out on the ice and boom.
translation.de: dann ging er auf das Eis und bumm.

translation.en: He would biff it so hard...

translation.en: ...people would come running from five blocks away.
translation.de: dass Leute von Weitem angerannt kamen.

translation.en: Yeah, but did he collect?

translation.en: "Did he collect?" Slippin' Jimmy had it dialed in.

translation.en: One good fall, he'd clear 6, 8 grand.

Six hundred and thirty bucks? Was that for one fall?
